Menu App

This app handles all Menu-related functionality.

menu.views.menu_delete(request, pk)[source]

Delete a menu item.

Retrieves a MenuItem by primary key and deletes it from the database. Redirects to the menu list after deletion.

Parameters:

  • request (HttpRequest) – The HTTP request object.

  • pk (int) – Primary key of the MenuItem to delete.

Returns:

Redirects to the ‘menu_list’ view.

Return type:

HttpResponseRedirect

menu.views.menu_edit(request, pk)[source]

Edit an existing menu item.

Retrieves a MenuItem by primary key. If the request method is POST, updates the item with form data. Otherwise, displays the form pre-filled with the item’s current data.

Parameters:

  • request (HttpRequest) – The HTTP request object.

  • pk (int) – Primary key of the MenuItem to edit.

Returns:

Renders ‘menu/menu_edit.html’ with the edit form.

Return type:

HttpResponse

menu.views.menu_list(request)[source]

Display all menu items and handle adding a new menu item.

This view fetches all existing MenuItem records and displays them in a list. It also processes the form submission for adding a new menu item.

Parameters:

request (HttpRequest) – The HTTP request object.

Returns:

Renders ‘menu/menu_list.html’ with menu items and add form.

Return type:

HttpResponse

class menu.models.MenuItem(*args, **kwargs)[source]

Represents a single menu item in the restaurant.

name

The name of the menu item.

Type:

str

price

The price of the item, up to 9999.99.

Type:

Decimal

available

True if the item is currently available for order.

Type:

bool

best_seller

True if the item is a popular or recommended choice.

Type:

bool

exception DoesNotExist
exception MultipleObjectsReturned
class menu.tests.MenuItemModelTest(methodName='runTest')[source]

Test suite for the MenuItem model.

Ensures that MenuItem instances can be created and that their fields contain the expected values.

setUp()[source]

Set up test data for MenuItem model tests.

Creates a sample MenuItem instance named “Pizza”.

test_menu_item_creation()[source]

Test that a MenuItem is correctly created and its fields are accurate.

Checks the price and availability of the created MenuItem.

class menu.tests.MenuViewsTest(methodName='runTest')[source]

Test suite for Menu-related views.

Ensures that the menu list view loads correctly and displays menu items.

setUp()[source]

Set up test data for Menu views tests.

Creates a sample MenuItem instance named “Burger”.

test_menu_list_view()[source]

Test that the menu list view returns HTTP 200 and contains expected content.

Sends a GET request to the ‘menu’ view and checks for status code and item name.
